txt.en: Minda can be found near a pond in the central Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Minda Heathertoes.
'Well, will you look at that! These are the plumpest frog legs I have ever laid eyes on! My master will be thrilled, as will her honoured guest!'

'One of my master’s feast guests loves frog legs. Buttered, grilled... you name it, he loves it! My League of the Axe friends told me where there is an abundance of the critters. So many, in fact, that they are crowding out the smaller frogs in the area. We shall be doing those little ones a favour, if you ask me!\n\n'Unfortunately, the frogs I need like the lake and moat next to the enemy settlement! There is no way I could get close enough to gather the frogs, but you definitely could! Please, [placeholder]. Save the feast and bring me frog legs!'

'One of my master’s feast guests loves frog legs. Buttered, grilled... you name it, he loves it! My League of the Axe friends told me where there is an abundance of the critters. So many, in fact, that they are crowding out the smaller frogs in the area. We shall be doing those little ones a favour, if you ask me!\n\n'Unfortunately, the frogs I need like the lake and moat next to the enemy settlement! There is no way I could get close enough to gather the frogs, but you definitely could! Please, [placeholder]. Save the feast and bring me frog legs!'
Minda Heathertoes needs help procuring a special ingredient for her master's feast.

'One of my master’s feast guests loves frog legs. Buttered, grilled... you name it, he loves it! My League of the Axe friends told me where there is an abundance of the critters. So many, in fact, that they are crowding out the smaller frogs in the area. We shall be doing those little ones a favour, if you ask me!

'Unfortunately, the frogs I need like the lake and moat next to the enemy settlement! There is no way I could get close enough to gather the frogs, but you definitely could! Please, [placeholder]. Save the feast and bring me frog legs!

Stomper and me are heading south. I have heard there is a merchant over this hill who has a supply of a special spice I require.'
Wildwood croakers can be found in watery locales in central Wildwood.\n\nCollect frog legs from Wildwood croakers.
